column5: My place is close to restaurants and dining, family-friendly activities downtown Fort Worth Hulen Mall Burleson, TX . Youâ€™ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the neighborhood, and the ambiance. This space is good for couples and solo adventurers. I am not off the bus line but Uber or lyft can take you right up the street about 3 miles to the nearest stop if necessary. The queen size bed has memory foam topping for a very soft bed. I have 2 small trained dogs that are friendly and clean.
